data.title: Ryan Phillippe, known for his role in "I Know What You Did Last Summer," achieved a significant milestone in his ongoing journey of...
data.meta_description:
4,086 likes, 22 comments - sober_celebrities on September 15, 2023: "Ryan Phillippe, known for his role in "I Know What You Did Last Summer," achieved a significant milestone in his ongoing journey of sobriety on September 13. He proudly shared that this marks the longest period since his teenage years without nicotine, marijuana, or other substances.

In an Instagram post, he expressed his gratitude for the newfound freedom that accompanies breaking free from addiction and dependency on substances.

Accompanied by a mirror selfie featuring him in a sleeveless white tee, aviator shades, and a Laval crossbody shoulder bag, with a toothpick in his mouth, @ryanphillippe reflected on his journey. 

He described sobriety as a path to clarity and spiritual connectedness, emphasizing how good it feels.

With a touch of humor, he shared on his Instagram Stories that his only remaining addiction now is toothpicks and self-improvement.

This revelation about his sobriety journey comes just four days after Ryan celebrated his 49th birthday. During his 40s, the "Cruel Intentions" actor had focused on improving both his mental and physical health, describing his workout routine as intense. Moreover, he shared that he had learned to care less about others' opinions, highlighting his commitment to self-improvement and personal growth.".
